scripts.build-boot: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json && NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:existing && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json
scripts.build-boot-core: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json && yarn dream sync:config-cache --core && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn build-boot && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build-core: yarn before-build-core && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build-core.json && yarn after-build-core
scripts.before-build-core: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && yarn build-boot-core
scripts.after-build-core: cp .dream.yml dist/.dream.yml && mkdir dist/test-app/conf/env && cp test-app/conf/env/db.yml dist/test-app/conf/env/db.yml
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -e .no-dream-postinstall ]; then NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:existing && yarn build; fi
